`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# stamp shown in the history command output.
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# You can set one of the optional three formats:
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# "mm/dd/yyyy"|"dd.mm.yyyy"|"yyyy-mm-dd"
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# or set a custom format using the strftime function format specifications,
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# see 'man strftime' for details.
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# HIST_STAMPS="mm/dd/yyyy"
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# Would you like to use another custom folder than $ZSH/custom?

`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# Which plugins would you like to load?

`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# Add wisely, as too many plugins slow down shell startup.
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`plugins=(git)
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`
`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`source $ZSH/oh-my-zsh.sh

`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# User configuration

`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# export MANPATH="/usr/local/man:$MANPATH"

`}),(0,e.jsx)(n.span,{className:"code-line",children:`# You may need to manually set your language environment
